### Extracting sequences' coordinates using voucher information in GenBank


```{r, echo=F}
db <- "/Users/afr/Desktop/A/Postdoc/Birds_museum_data/BMD_exploratory/Data/coordinates.temp"
BMD_raw <- read.delim(db, header = F, stringsAsFactors = F)
colnames(BMD_raw) <- c("ID", "Species", "Coordinates", "Location", "Voucher","Isolate", "Haplotype")
BMD_Vo_all <- BMD_raw[which(BMD_raw$Voucher != "voucher_is_not_available"),]
```
In total there are `r dim(BMD_raw)[1]` sequences for Aves in GenBank, of those, `r dim(BMD_Vo_all)[1]` have voucher information (`r round(dim(BMD_Vo_all)[1]/dim(BMD_raw)[1] * 100)`%)
